name: Blink Logic
overview: Blink Logic Inc. develops and markets Web-based software solutions that translate data into tables, charts, and maps. The companyâ€™s primary software solution, called Blink Logic, presents itself as an information dashboard or front-end solution to the Business Intelligence (BI) and relational database server infrastructure that are used by businesses worldwide. Blink Logic is a zero footprint Web-based solution that allows end-users to create visual dashboard-like live business views on top of their existing relational and OLAP data sources. Blink Logic is deployed on a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) basis, allowing a customer to pay for its solution on a monthly basis. Blink Logic’s data moving feature allows the automatic transfer of customer data across physical infrastructure according to hardware load and performance. Markets The company targets the business intelligence software market and the business data market with the same technology and solutions. Business Intelligence Software Market: This market includes various tools and applications focused on helping knowledge workers and business managers to access and analyze business data and performance metrics. Business Data Market: This market includes companies that are in the business of selling industry and market research data. Competition The companyâ€™s major competitors include Cognos, Business Objects, Microsoft, Oracle, Microstrategy, and SAS. Its competitors also include Panorama Software, Dundas Software, Corda Technologies, LucidEra, Pivotlink, iDashboards, and Targit.
